verses.verse: וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> came אַחַר֙ <WH310> And it came to pass after הַדְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> these things הָאֵ֔לֶּה <WH428> these חָ֥טְא֛וּ <WH2398> had offended מַשְׁקֵ֥ה <WH4945> the cupbearer מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> of the king מִצְרַ֖יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְהָאֹפֶ֑ה <WH644> and [his] baker לַאֲדֹנֵיהֶ֖ם <WH113> their lord לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> the king מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> of Egypt

וַיִּקְצֹ֣ף <WH7107> was wroth פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh עַ֖ל <WH5921> against שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> two סָרִיסָ֑יו <WH5631> [of] his officers עַ֚ל <WH5921> and שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> against the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֔ים <WH4945> cupbearer וְעַ֖ל <WH5921> and שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> and against the chief הָאוֹפִֽים׃ <WH644> of the bakers

וַיִּתֵּ֨ן <WH5414> And he put אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> בְּמִשְׁמַ֗ר <WH4929> them in ward בֵּ֛ית <WH1004> in the house שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> of the captain הַטַבָּחִ֖ים <WH2876> of the guard אֶל־ <WH413> in בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the house הַסֹּ֑הַר <WH5470> prison מְק֕וֹם <WH4725> the place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> where Joseph אָס֥וּר <WH631> [was] bound שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> in it

וַ֠יִּפְקֹד <WH6485> charged שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> And the captain הַטַּבָּחִ֧ים <WH2876> of the guard אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵ֛ף <WH3130> Joseph אִתָּ֖ם <WH854> and he וַיְשָׁ֣רֶת <WH8334> with them and he served אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וַיִּהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> them and they continued a season בְּמִשְׁמָֽר׃ <WH4929> in ward

וַיַּֽחַלְמוּ֩ <WH2492> And they dreamed חֲל֨וֹם <WH2472> a dream שְׁנֵיהֶ֜ם <WH8147> both of them אִ֤ישׁ <WH582> another חֲלֹמוֹ֙ <WH2472> his dream בְּלַ֣יְלָה <WH3915> night אֶחָ֔ד <WH259> in one אִ֖ישׁ <WH582> another כְּפִתְר֣וֹן <WH6623> according to the interpretation חֲלֹמ֑וֹ <WH2472> of his dream הַמַּשְׁקֶ֣ה <WH4945> the cupbearer וְהָאֹפֶ֗ה <WH644> and the baker אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> of the king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who אֲסוּרִ֖ים <WH631> which [were] bound בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> court הַסֹּֽהַר׃ <WH5470> prison

וַיָּבֹ֧א <WH935> came in אֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH413> when יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> And Joseph בַּבֹּ֑קֶר <WH1242> unto them in the morning וַיַּ֣רְא <WH7200> and looked אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> וְהִנָּ֖ם <WH2005> behold זֹעֲפִֽים׃ <WH2196> upon them and behold they [were] sad

וַיִּשְׁאַ֞ל <WH7592> And he asked אֶת־ <WH853> סְרִיסֵ֣י <WH5631> officers פַרְעֹ֗ה <WH6547> Pharaoh's אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who אִתּ֧וֹ <WH854> in בְמִשְׁמַ֛ר <WH4929> that [were] with him in the ward בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> house אֲדֹנָ֖יו <WH113> of his lord's לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying מַדּ֛וּעַ <WH4069> Why פְּנֵיכֶ֥ם <WH6440> Wherefore look רָעִ֖ים <WH7451> ye [so] sadly הַיּֽוֹם׃ <WH3117> age

וַיֹּאמְר֣וּ <WH559> And they said אֵלָ֔יו <WH413> about חֲל֣וֹם <WH2472> a dream חָלַ֔מְנוּ <WH2492> unto him We have dreamed וּפֹתֵ֖ר <WH6622> and [there is] no interpreter אֵ֣ין <WH369> and there אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said אֲלֵהֶ֜ם <WH413> about יוֹסֵ֗ף <WH3130> of it And Joseph הֲל֤וֹא <WH3808> not לֵֽאלֹהִים֙ <WH430> angels פִּתְרֹנִ֔ים <WH6623> unto them [Do] not interpretations סַפְּרוּ־ <WH5608> commune נָ֖א <WH4994> please לִֽי׃

וַיְסַפֵּ֧ר <WH5608> told שַֽׂר־ <WH8269> And the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֛ים <WH4945> cupbearer אֶת־ <WH853> חֲלֹמ֖וֹ <WH2472> his dream לְיוֹסֵ֑ף <WH3130> to Joseph וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said ל֔וֹ בַּחֲלוֹמִ֕י <WH2472> to him In my dream וְהִנֵּה־ <WH2009> behold גֶ֖פֶן <WH1612> behold a vine לְפָנָֽי׃ <WH6440> [was] before me

וּבַגֶּ֖פֶן <WH1612> And in the vine שְׁלֹשָׁ֣ה <WH7969> [were] three שָׂרִיגִ֑ם <WH8299> branches וְהִ֤יא <WH1931> it was כְפֹרַ֙חַת֙ <WH6524> and it [was] as though it budded עָלְתָ֣ה <WH5927> shot forth נִצָּ֔הּ <WH5322> [and] her blossoms הִבְשִׁ֥ילוּ <WH1310> thereof brought forth ripe אַשְׁכְּלֹתֶ֖יהָ <WH811> and the clusters עֲנָבִֽים׃ <WH6025> grapes

וְכ֥וֹס <WH3563> cup פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> And Pharaoh's בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> [was] in my hand וָאֶקַּ֣ח <WH3947> and I took אֶת־ <WH853> הָֽעֲנָבִ֗ים <WH6025> the grapes וָֽאֶשְׂחַ֤ט <WH7818> and pressed אֹתָם֙ <WH853> אֶל־ <WH413> about כּ֣וֹס <WH3563> cup פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> them into Pharaoh's וָאֶתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and I gave אֶת־ <WH853> הַכּ֖וֹס <WH3563> the cup עַל־ <WH5921> and כַּ֥ף <WH3709> hand פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> into Pharaoh's

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said לוֹ֙ יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> And Joseph זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This פִּתְרֹנ֑וֹ <WH6623> unto him This [is] the interpretation שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH7969> of it The three הַשָּׂ֣רִגִ֔ים <WH8299> branches שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> [are] three יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> like

בְּע֣וֹד ׀ <WH5750> Yet שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> within three יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> days יִשָּׂ֤א <WH5375> lift up פַרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> shall Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> רֹאשֶׁ֔ךָ <WH7218> thine head וַהֲשִֽׁיבְךָ֖ <WH7725> and restore עַל־ <WH5921> and כַּנֶּ֑ךָ <WH3653> thee unto thy place וְנָתַתָּ֤ <WH5414> and thou shalt deliver כוֹס־ <WH3563> cup פַּרְעֹה֙ <WH6547> Pharaoh's בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> into his hand כַּמִּשְׁפָּט֙ <WH4941> manner הָֽרִאשׁ֔וֹן <WH7223> after the former אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> when הָיִ֖יתָ <WH1961> become מַשְׁקֵֽהוּ׃ <WH4945> were his cupbearer

כִּ֧י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo זְכַרְתַּ֣נִי <WH2142> But think אִתְּךָ֗ <WH854> for כַּאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> it יִ֣יטַב <WH3190> on me when it shall be well לָ֔ךְ וְעָשִֽׂיתָ־ <WH6213> with thee and shew נָּ֥א <WH4994> and please עִמָּדִ֖י <WH5978> me חָ֑סֶד <WH2617> kindness וְהִזְכַּרְתַּ֙נִי֙ <WH2142> I pray thee unto me and make mention אֶל־ <WH413> to פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> of me unto Pharaoh וְהוֹצֵאתַ֖נִי <WH3318> and bring me מִן־ <WH4480> at הַבַּ֥יִת <WH1004> out of this house הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> of this

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for גֻנֹּ֣ב <WH1589> For indeed I was stolen away גֻּנַּ֔בְתִּי <WH1589> kidnapped מֵאֶ֖רֶץ <WH776> out of the land הָעִבְרִ֑ים <WH5680> of the Hebrews וְגַם־ <WH1571> and even פֹּה֙ <WH6311> here לֹא־ <WH3808> not עָשִׂ֣יתִֽי <WH6213> and here also have I done מְא֔וּמָה <WH3972> nothing כִּֽי־ <WH3588> should שָׂמ֥וּ <WH7760> that they should put אֹתִ֖י <WH853> בַּבּֽוֹר׃ <WH953> me into the dungeon

וַיַּ֥רְא <WH7200> saw שַׂר־ <WH8269> When the chief הָאֹפִ֖ים <WH644> baker כִּ֣י <WH3588> for ט֣וֹב <WH2896> was good פָּתָ֑ר <WH6622> that the interpretation וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> he said אֶל־ <WH413> to יוֹסֵ֔ף <WH3130> unto Joseph אַף־ <WH637> I also אֲנִי֙ <WH589> I בַּחֲלוֹמִ֔י <WH2472> [was] in my dream וְהִנֵּ֗ה <WH2009> and behold שְׁלֹשָׁ֛ה <WH7969> and behold [I had] three סַלֵּ֥י <WH5536> baskets חֹרִ֖י <WH2751> white עַל־ <WH5921> on רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <WH7218> on my head

וּבַסַּ֣ל <WH5536> basket הָֽעֶלְי֔וֹן <WH5945> And in the uppermost מִכֹּ֛ל <WH3605> of all מַאֲכַ֥ל <WH3978> [there was] of all manner פַּרְעֹ֖ה <WH6547> for Pharaoh מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> act אֹפֶ֑ה <WH644> of baked וְהָע֗וֹף <WH5775> and the birds אֹכֵ֥ל <WH398> did eat אֹתָ֛ם <WH853> מִן־ <WH4480> some הַסַּ֖ל <WH5536> them out of the basket מֵעַ֥ל <WH5921> upon רֹאשִֽׁי׃ <WH7218> my head

וַיַּ֤עַן <WH6030> answered יוֹסֵף֙ <WH3130> And Joseph וַיֹּ֔אמֶר <WH559> and said זֶ֖ה <WH2088> This פִּתְרֹנ֑וֹ <WH6623> This [is] the interpretation שְׁלֹ֙שֶׁת֙ <WH7969> thereof The three הַסַּלִּ֔ים <WH5536> baskets שְׁלֹ֥שֶׁת <WH7969> [are] three יָמִ֖ים <WH3117> days הֵֽם׃ <WH1992> like

בְּע֣וֹד ׀ <WH5750> more שְׁלֹ֣שֶׁת <WH7969> Yet within three יָמִ֗ים <WH3117> days יִשָּׂ֨א <WH5375> lift up פַרְעֹ֤ה <WH6547> shall Pharaoh אֶת־ <WH853> רֹֽאשְׁךָ֙ <WH7218> thy head מֵֽעָלֶ֔יךָ <WH5921> and וְתָלָ֥ה <WH8518> from off thee and shall hang אוֹתְךָ֖ <WH853> עַל־ <WH5921> on עֵ֑ץ <WH6086> thee on a tree וְאָכַ֥ל <WH398> shall eat הָע֛וֹף <WH5775> and the birds אֶת־ <WH853> בְּשָׂרְךָ֖ <WH1320> thy flesh מֵעָלֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5921> and

וַיְהִ֣י ׀ <WH1961> came בַּיּ֣וֹם <WH3117> day הַשְּׁלִישִׁ֗י <WH7992> And it came to pass the third י֚וֹם <WH3117> day הֻלֶּ֣דֶת <WH3205> bear אֶת־ <WH853> פַּרְעֹ֔ה <WH6547> [which was] Pharaoh's וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> that he made מִשְׁתֶּ֖ה <WH4960> a feast לְכָל־ <WH3605> for all עֲבָדָ֑יו <WH5650> unto all his servants וַיִּשָּׂ֞א <WH5375> and he lifted up אֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֣אשׁ ׀ <WH7218> the head שַׂ֣ר <WH8269> of the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֗ים <WH4945> cupbearer וְאֶת־ <WH853> רֹ֛אשׁ <WH7218> and the head שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> and of the chief הָאֹפִ֖ים <WH644> baker בְּת֥וֹךְ <WH8432> among עֲבָדָֽיו׃ <WH5650> his servants

וַיָּ֛שֶׁב <WH7725> again אֶת־ <WH853> שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֖ים <WH4945> unto his butlership עַל־ <WH5921> unto מַשְׁקֵ֑הוּ <WH4945> his office וַיִּתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> and he gave הַכּ֖וֹס <WH3563> the cup עַל־ <WH5921> and כַּ֥ף <WH3709> hand פַּרְעֹֽה׃ <WH6547> into Pharaoh's
וְאֵ֛ת <WH853> שַׂ֥ר <WH8269> the chief הָאֹפִ֖ים <WH644> baker תָּלָ֑ה <WH8518> But he hanged כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after פָּתַ֛ר <WH6622> had interpreted לָהֶ֖ם יוֹסֵֽף׃ <WH3130> as Joseph
וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> did not זָכַ֧ר <WH2142> remember שַֽׂר־ <WH8269> Yet did not the chief הַמַּשְׁקִ֛ים <WH4945> cupbearer אֶת־ <WH853> יוֹסֵ֖ף <WH3130> Joseph וַיִּשְׁכָּחֵֽהוּ׃ <WH7911> but forgat פ
